thread.title: Randy Ross calls Patty Sheehan the “Tax Queen” in Orlando District 4 race
thread.title_full: Randy Ross calls Patty Sheehan the “Tax Queen” in Orlando District 4 race

author: Frank Torres
title: Randy Ross calls Patty Sheehan the “Tax Queen” in Orlando District 4 race
text:
Pinterest 0 
Activist and Talk Show Host Randy Ross has pushed out his latest mailer in his bid to be the next City Commissioner for Orlando District 4, and it’s calling 16-year incumbent, Patty Sheehan , the “Tax Queen”. 
Ross is referring to the 17.7% property tax increase passed unanimously by the Orlando City Council last year, that has also become the main avenue attack in the District 6 and Orlando Mayor race as well. 
The front of the mailer features Ross’ logo and motto saying “Making Orlando a Better Place to Live for You and Your Family” 
The reverse side shows Sheehan on the job with “16 Years” stamped over the photo. It tags her on the property tax increase and asks the question “Is the Tax Queen a Career Politician?” 16 Years is too long. It’s time for a change” 
Sheehan has said the message has gotten distorted, and that imposed caps on commercial properties led to a substantial decrease in revenue that led to a 40 percent decrease in the city’s revenue and the $7 dollar per month increase is below 2009 levels. 
Navy Veteran Aretha Olivarez is also running. Election day is November 3rd. Readers who read this, also read these
